body:
Hi Greg,


I tested now again for 5000x5000 and 15000x15000 two WINSIZ setting (127 
and 1027):


for 127 I get a max deviation of the patch solid angle of 11% for the 
5000x5000 and 18% for the 15000x15000.


for the 1027 : 8% for the 5000x5000 and 5% 15000x15000. The memory usage 
was in both case not really big - never more than 900kB (compared to 
evalglare this is nothing... the 15000x15000 resulted in 14GB..)


I think this is fine now... for many angles the error is also much 
smaller. I'm glad we solved this problem - thanks again!


I have to say that my previous table was generated with a pcomb version 
from the 5.0 release, using a setting of 64 for WINSIZ...


I was not aware of the needed update of pcomb when using the 
fisheye_corr.cal. I'm usually running the official release on our server 
for "production" for all users and not the head release - but maybe I 
should change this philosophy.


Cheers


Jan
